items.summary: In the Hero section of frontend/src/App.tsx, update ONLY the hero logo rendering so the full logo is always clearly visible (not clipped at the top or bottom) across mobile and desktop. Ensure the logo preserves its aspect ratio and is not cropped by any sizing/overflow behavior.

Make the hero logo image blend with the website background by using a logo asset with a transparent background (or otherwise matching the site background), and update the hero logo in frontend/src/App.tsx to reference the updated static asset under frontend/public/assets/generated.
